design_philosophy.core_concept: Barangay Modern - A lifeline, not just a dashboard.
design_philosophy.vibe: Authoritative yet Community-Centric. High-contrast for emergencies, calming for administration.
principles: Signal over Noise: Color is semantic. Red means danger, nothing else.
Thumb-First: Critical actions (SOS, Report) must be reachable with one hand.
Data Density vs. Clarity: Residents get clarity (big cards), Officials get density (grids).
Local Context: Use imagery and language that feels like home (The Philippines).

typography.instructions: Import 'Outfit' and 'Public Sans' from Google Fonts in index.css. Use Outfit for all headings to give a modern, geometric feel. Use Public Sans for body text for maximum legibility.

critical.name: Signal Red
critical.usage: Active Emergencies, SOS buttons, Critical Alerts ONLY.

safe.name: Resolution Emerald
safe.usage: All clear, success states, resolved reports.

colors.theme_strategy: Auto-toggle. Light mode is 'Paper & Ink' (High legibility). Dark mode is 'Control Room' (Low eye strain, high signal contrast).

layout_system.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

grid_modes.resident_feed: Single column (max-w-md mx-auto) for mobile focus. Big, touchable cards.
grid_modes.official_dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B). Dense data. Map takes 2x2 span. Recent reports take 1x2 span.
grid_modes.landing_page: Asymmetric 'Tetris' grid. Hero text left, Hero image right (overlapping).

buttons.style: Pill-shaped for primary actions. Sharp rectangles for filters/secondary.
buttons.sos_button: Fixed position (bottom-right) or centered on mobile hero. Pulse animation. Red background.

cards.style: Flat with 1px border. No shadow in dark mode. Soft shadow-lg in light mode.
cards.alert_card: Must have a colored left-border strip indicating severity (Red/Orange/Green).

inputs.style: Shadcn default but with h-12 for better touch targets.

navigation.mobile: Bottom Tab Bar (Fixed). Icons only with active state labels.

hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background or side image.

emergency_context.usage: Emergency reporting section or 'About' section context.

community_spirit.usage: Community/Resident dashboard header or profile placeholder.

abstract_bg.usage: Login page background or decorative elements.

visual_assets.icons: Use Lucide-React. Preferred icons: AlertTriangle, Megaphone, ShieldCheck, MapPin, Activity.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95).
motion.transitions: Page transitions: Fade in + Slide up (y-4 to y-0).
motion.emergency_pulse: Keyframes: 0% scale-100 opacity-100, 100% scale-150 opacity-0. Use for SOS button.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text on Red/Blue backgrounds is White. Use APCA standards.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-brand-500 on all interactive elements.
accessibility.aria: Alerts must have role='alert'. Status updates role='status'.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Use Shadcn components for complex interactions (Dialog, Select, Datepicker).
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the responsive container logic.
